name: lit-lake
description: A MCP to connect your reference managers to Claude

disable_embedding.title: Disable Embedding
disable_embedding.description: Used to disable the embedding background processes for Lit Lake. Useful to enable when battery life is a concern

z_db.title: Zotero DB
z_db.description: The path to the Zotero db file (Optional: defaults to ~/Zotero/zotero.sqlite)

lit_lake_folder.title: Lit Lake Folder
lit_lake_folder.description: The parent folder in which the 'LitLake' data folder should be created within (Optional: defaults to ~/LitLake)

gemini_api_key.title: Gemini API Key
gemini_api_key.description: Optional. If set, PDFs are extracted with Gemini. Otherwise Lit Lake uses local extract-pdf.
